description:
This document is an up-to-date specification of all metadata terms maintained by the Dublin Core Metadata Initiative, including properties, vocabulary encoding schemes, syntax encoding schemes, and classes.

This document is an up-to-date, authoritative specification of all metadata terms maintained by the Dublin Core Metadata Initiative. Included are the fifteen terms of the Dublin Core Metadata Element Set, which have also been published as [IETF RFC 5013](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc5013.txt), [ANSI/NISO Standard Z39.85-2007](http://www.niso.org/apps/group_public/download.php/10256/Z39-85-2012_dublin_core.pdf), and [ISO Standard 15836:2009](http://www.iso.org/iso/search.htm?qt=15836&searchSubmit=Search&sort=rel&type=simple&published=on).

Version: 1.1.0

Agent.label: Agent
Agent.description: A resource that acts or has the power to act.

BibliographicResource.label: Bibliographic Resource
BibliographicResource.description: A book, article, or other documentary resource.

Box.label: DCMI Box
Box.description: The set of regions in space defined by their geographic coordinates according to the DCMI Box Encoding Scheme.

DCMIType.label: DCMI Type Vocabulary
DCMIType.description: The set of classes specified by the DCMI Type Vocabulary, used to categorize the nature or genre of the resource.

DDC.label: DDC
DDC.description: The set of conceptual resources specified by the Dewey Decimal Classification.

Frequency.label: Frequency
Frequency.description: A rate at which something recurs.

IMT.label: IMT
IMT.description: The set of media types specified by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority.

ISO3166.label: ISO 3166
ISO3166.description: The set of codes listed in ISO 3166-1 for the representation of names of countries.

ISO639-2.label: ISO 639-2
ISO639-2.description: The three-letter alphabetic codes listed in ISO639-2 for the representation of names of languages.

ISO639-3.label: ISO 639-3
ISO639-3.description: The set of three-letter codes listed in ISO 639-3 for the representation of names of languages.

Jurisdiction.label: Jurisdiction
Jurisdiction.description: The extent or range of judicial, law enforcement, or other authority.

LCC.label: LCC
LCC.description: The set of conceptual resources specified by the Library of Congress Classification.

LCSH.label: LCSH
LCSH.description: The set of labeled concepts specified by the Library of Congress Subject Headings.

LicenseDocument.label: License Document
LicenseDocument.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource.

LinguisticSystem.label: Linguistic System
LinguisticSystem.description: A system of signs, symbols, sounds, gestures, or rules used in communication.

Location.label: Location
Location.description: A spatial region or named place.

LocationPeriodOrJurisdiction.label: Location, Period, or Jurisdiction
LocationPeriodOrJurisdiction.description: A location, period of time, or jurisdiction.

MESH.label: MeSH
MESH.description: The set of labeled concepts specified by the Medical Subject Headings.

MediaType.label: Media Type
MediaType.description: A file format or physical medium.

MethodOfAccrual.label: Method of Accrual
MethodOfAccrual.description: A method by which resources are added to a collection.

MethodOfInstruction.label: Method of Instruction
MethodOfInstruction.description: A process that is used to engender knowledge, attitudes, and skills.

NLM.label: NLM
NLM.description: The set of conceptual resources specified by the National Library of Medicine Classification.

Period.label: DCMI Period
Period.description: The set of time intervals defined by their limits according to the DCMI Period Encoding Scheme.

PeriodOfTime.label: Period of Time
PeriodOfTime.description: An interval of time that is named or defined by its start and end dates.

Point.label: DCMI Point
Point.description: The set of points in space defined by their geographic coordinates according to the DCMI Point Encoding Scheme.

Policy.label: Policy
Policy.description: A plan or course of action by an authority, intended to influence and determine decisions, actions, and other matters.

ProvenanceStatement.label: Provenance Statement
ProvenanceStatement.description: Any changes in ownership and custody of a resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.

RFC1766.label: RFC 1766
RFC1766.description: The set of tags, constructed according to RFC 1766, for the identification of languages.

RFC3066.label: RFC 3066
RFC3066.description: RFC 3066 has been obsoleted by RFC 4646.

RightsStatement.label: Rights Statement
RightsStatement.description: A statement about the intellectual property rights (IPR) held in or over a resource, a legal document giving official permission to do something with a resource, or a statement about access rights.

SizeOrDuration.label: Size or Duration
SizeOrDuration.description: A dimension or extent, or a time taken to play or execute.

Standard.label: Standard
Standard.description: A reference point against which other things can be evaluated or compared.

TGN.label: TGN
TGN.description: The set of places specified by the Getty Thesaurus of Geographic Names.

UDC.label: UDC
UDC.description: The set of conceptual resources specified by the Universal Decimal Classification.

URI.label: URI
URI.description: The set of identifiers constructed according to the generic syntax for Uniform Resource Identifiers as specified by the Internet Engineering Task Force.

W3CDTF.label: W3C-DTF
W3CDTF.description: The set of dates and times constructed according to the W3C Date and Time Formats Specification.

accessRights.label: Access Rights
accessRights.description: Access Rights may include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies.

accrualMethod.label: Accrual Method
accrualMethod.description: Recommended practice is to use a value from the Collection Description Accrual Method Vocabulary [[DCMI-ACCRUALMETHOD](https://dublincore.org/groups/collections/accrual-method/)].

accrualPeriodicity.label: Accrual Periodicity
accrualPeriodicity.description: Recommended practice is to use a value from the Collection Description Frequency Vocabulary [[DCMI-COLLFREQ](https://dublincore.org/groups/collections/frequency/)].

accrualPolicy.label: Accrual Policy
accrualPolicy.description: Recommended practice is to use a value from the Collection Description Accrual Policy Vocabulary [[DCMI-ACCRUALPOLICY](https://dublincore.org/groups/collections/accrual-policy/)].

alternative.label: Alternative Title
alternative.description: An alternative name for the resource.

audience.label: Audience
audience.description: A class of agents for whom the resource is intended or useful.

available.label: Date Available
available.description: Date that the resource became or will become available.

bibliographicCitation.label: Bibliographic Citation
bibliographicCitation.description: A bibliographic reference for the resource.

conformsTo.label: Conforms To
conformsTo.description: An established standard to which the described resource conforms.

contributor.label: Contributor
contributor.description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.

coverage.label: Coverage
coverage.description: Spatial topic and spatial applicability may be a named place or a location specified by its geographic coordinates. Temporal topic may be a named period, date, or date range. A jurisdiction may be a named administrative entity or a geographic place to which the resource applies. Recommended practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the Getty Thesaurus of Geographic Names [[TGN](https://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabulary/tgn/index.html)]. Where appropriate, named places or time periods may be used in preference to numeric identifiers such as sets of coordinates or date ranges.  Because coverage is so broadly defined, it is preferable to use the more specific subproperties Temporal Coverage and Spatial Coverage.

created.label: Date Created
created.description: Date of creation of the resource.

creator.label: Creator
creator.description: An entity responsible for making the resource.

date.label: Date
date.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.

dateAccepted.label: Date Accepted
dateAccepted.description: Date of acceptance of the resource.

dateCopyrighted.label: Date Copyrighted
dateCopyrighted.description: Date of copyright of the resource.

dateSubmitted.label: Date Submitted
dateSubmitted.description: Date of submission of the resource.

educationLevel.label: Audience Education Level
educationLevel.description: A class of agents, defined in terms of progression through an educational or training context, for which the described resource is intended.

extent.label: Extent
extent.description: Recommended practice is to specify the file size in megabytes and duration in ISO 8601 format.

format.label: Format
format.description: Recommended practice is to use a controlled vocabulary where available. For example, for file formats one could use the list of Internet Media Types [[MIME](https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml)].  Examples of dimensions include size and duration.

hasFormat.label: Has Format
hasFormat.description: A related resource that is substantially the same as the pre-existing described resource, but in another format.

hasPart.label: Has Part
hasPart.description: A related resource that is included either physically or logically in the described resource.

hasVersion.label: Has Version
hasVersion.description: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource.

identifier.label: Identifier
identifier.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

instructionalMethod.label: Instructional Method
instructionalMethod.description: A process, used to engender knowledge, attitudes and skills, that the described resource is designed to support.

isFormatOf.label: Is Format Of
isFormatOf.description: A pre-existing related resource that is substantially the same as the described resource, but in another format.

isPartOf.label: Is Part Of
isPartOf.description: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included.

isReferencedBy.label: Is Referenced By
isReferencedBy.description: A related resource that references, cites, or otherwise points to the described resource.

isReplacedBy.label: Is Replaced By
isReplacedBy.description: A related resource that supplants, displaces, or supersedes the described resource.

isRequiredBy.label: Is Required By
isRequiredBy.description: A related resource that requires the described resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence.

isVersionOf.label: Is Version Of
isVersionOf.description: A related resource of which the described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation.

issued.label: Date Issued
issued.description: Date of formal issuance of the resource.

license.label: License
license.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

mediator.label: Mediator
mediator.description: An entity that mediates access to the resource.

medium.label: Medium
medium.description: The material or physical carrier of the resource.

modified.label: Date Modified
modified.description: Date on which the resource was changed.

provenance.label: Provenance
provenance.description: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of the resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.

publisher.label: Publisher
publisher.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

references.label: References
references.description: A related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the described resource.

replaces.label: Replaces
replaces.description: A related resource that is supplanted, displaced, or superseded by the described resource.

requires.label: Requires
requires.description: A related resource that is required by the described resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence.

rights.label: Rights
rights.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

rightsHolder.label: Rights Holder
rightsHolder.description: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.

source.label: Source
source.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

tableOfContents.label: Table Of Contents
tableOfContents.description: A list of subunits of the resource.

title.label: Title
title.description: A name given to the resource.

type.label: Type
type.description: Recommended practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the DCMI Type Vocabulary [[DCMI-TYPE](http://dublincore.org/documents/dcmi-type-vocabulary/)]. To describe the file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource, use the property Format.

valid.label: Date Valid
valid.description: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.
